text: Sir Jeffrey Mark Donaldson (born 7 December 1962) is a Northern Irish politician. He was the leader of the Democratic Unionist Party (DUP) from 2021 to 2024 and the leader in the UK House of Commons from 2019 to 2024. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Lagan Valley since 1997. He is Northern Ireland's longest-serving current MP. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:Democratic Unionist Party MPs Category:Leaders of political parties in the United Kingdom
title: Jeffrey Donaldson
